snippet: BRACKMAN--Jody, passed away at home on February 9, 2016. Born July 2, 1952 in Newton, MA to Gerald and Marietta Hermanson, Jody was a beloved mother, wife, sister, daughter, aunt and dog parent. A respected attorney, public trustee, notorious free spirit, and the most devoted, caring and charitable person anyone could have had the privilege of knowing. Jody loved everyone and made it her mission to ensure everyone in her life knew it well. She is survived by her loving family: husband Robert, son Adam, daughter Emily, her brother Andrew and family. A celebration of Jody's life will be held on February 15, 2016 at 1pm at 746 Mamaroneck Ave, Mamaroneck, NY 10543. 1/3
